content:
I just tried to validate resource instances referencing the profile in meta.profile including the version (pipe notation).
Currently this isn't supported by the java validator or hapi. Are there any servers supporting this?
And is there a plan to include support into the java validator and hapi?
We are working on it for the Google implementation but I haven't heard of it being widely adopted.
I thought this was working. We've been using the pipe notation with HL7 Validator for a few months now.
tried with a current version: it is working.
